title: Hayat Devam Ediyor
overview: Ismail has four children from Kudret who are forcibly married. He has three children from Cennet. Ismail is no longer making any money and decided to immigrate to Istanbul with the support of his son Sirac and his daughter Zeliha. Meanwhile, the middle-aged daughter of the family lives love secretly with Kerem, the son of one of the oldest families in the region. Youth excitement and love fire cause both to make mistakes and Kerem and Hayat get together before they get married.
